name: Haloa Tonono
story: Haloa is a young police officer from the Caribbean, who joined the BLUFOR forces after completing her training. She is known for her outgoing and friendly personality, and her dedication to justice. Her faith in Christianity is a mainstay in her life, and she believes that it is her duty to make a difference in the world, one person at a time. Despite facing many challenges in her work, Haloa remains determined to make a positive impact in her community and the world at large.
